data.name: PaPaPub
data.detailed_description:
Update Notes


Thank you for your love PaPaPub. we are very honored to receive feedback from so many users. So we will submit the all English version next week. Please be patient. Thanks very much and have a good day!


Update Notes


Due to the new rules of the harmonious policy, discordant content will be intercepted by the store in some regions. In desperation, we can only temporarily adjust the release version, I hope you will forgive me. To fully experience the game, please download the corresponding supplemental content patch. Please check the other players in the community to share or download to our official website, please forgive us for the inconvenience caused by the players.


R&D status update [Nov.29]

Recently, we have adjusted and supplemented the plot settings of female customers;
The corresponding follow-up female customer role status and plot has also been edited and added.

Other arms, combat, UI and UE adjustments are still in progress, and screenshots will be released in the near future, so stay tuned.


About the Game

=Description=

The main character of the game is 18 years old.

=Synopsis=

This is an “RPG+SIM+GALGAME”game
You are a retired adventurer.
To make a living,
You open a small pub in this town.
Prepare food and drinks before opening.
Receive all kinds of adventurers.

You will meet many kinds of beautiful girls
A dignified and graceful nun
An innocent and lovely Succubus
A wilful girl from decent family
And……

Please do everything you can to receive them
Prepare delicious food and drinks
Or use some beautiful words
To make sure
These beautiful girls will “work” for you willingly ~~~



=Introduction=

This is an “RPG+SIM+GALGAME”game .

In 60 days
You can collect materials in the maze
And make props in alchemy.
You can earn a lot of gold
And expand the pub .
Add all kinds of new facilities.

Each type of prop will have a different function.
You can choose the props you need before you open the shop.
Each character has four plots and more than 10 exquisite CG's.
Depending on the number of heroines you have collected,there will be different endings.


=Recapitulation=

More than 40 CG's.
There are 4 different girls that you can choose from.
There are shops\materials\recruitment system and other interesting games in it.
The exciting story
Multiple endings you can choose.

data.short_description: This is an ordinary town. You are a retired adventurer. To make a living, You opened a small pub in this town. Prepare food and drinks before opening. Receive all kinds of adventurers. However, Just surch an unremarkable pub, There's some strange rumors came out…… In the dark night, The sounds coming out from the depths of the pub is……?
data.supported_languages:
Traditional Chinese*, English, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 集成顯示卡
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 380 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 獨立顯示卡
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
